title: Freedom4All
author: Freedom4All
created_time: June 26, 2023, 07:31:25 PMLast edit: June 28, 2023, 12:27:34 PM by Freedom4All
content: Hello online casinos and other crypto related businesses.I manage a news and opinion website focused on a Western European country. I briefly had Google Ads on this site, but I want nothing to do with Google. I'm looking for BTC-related companies, such as casinos, crypto trading platforms, or anything that fits the website.It's a website targeting a more traditional audience. By traditional, I mean people, especially those aged 30 and above, who despise globalization and value their privacy. Particularly now, as money seems to be centralized and cash is at risk of disappearing, all these people are seeking alternatives but don't know where to start. I think this audience has value for many of you.I build the website in 2019. I went up at the 1st of october 2019.We have a newsletter-email list. It is not an affiliate website. There is just 1 ad from a reader. People on my platform come because they are interested in what we write and which news we bring to them.And people from all audiences gamble and many beginners want to know more about cryptos and safety and privacy. Who sees an oportunity to work together with me?I can place my website here or by PM. Advice me if it is responsible to post my website in this topic.There are some more topics where I explain myself here. One here:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5457440.msg62455218#msg62455218

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: If you are looking for partner with gambling casinos, it good you made your intention know here, but then , you will have to contact any particular casino you want to partner with privately through their online customer care support, this board is sure the right place to post anything gambling casino related, but then, your post is partially not supposed to be here  but in the mail box of the casino you want to partner with, as it is right now, you likely may never get a response from any casino through this thread..So better contact the gambling casinos directly and respectively.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: There are some users/casinos that are looking for partnership in this board so you can make some research and locate those threads and contact them so you guys can discuss how it will be. Or as Fivestar4everMVP said it, you can visit the casino sites directly and discuss with the customer Care service.

comments.author: Freedom4All
comments.body: That´s indeed why I opened this topic.I see a lot of crypto-casino owners or representatives.Thank you for the hint. I still have not found out which section is oppropriate or if I should PM them directly.I keep reseacrhing and I already wrote 2 casinos.More tips, VERY welcome!

comments.author: CryptoCasinoGeeks
comments.body: Hey there! I run a website that specializes in crypto casino reviews. Check it out!Do let me know if you think we could collaborate. Any and all feedback is welcome.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: well, when a person intends to expose their services or an investment opportunity or want a partnership, that person shows their product so that people can see what it is about and if they are interested or not in the product they are seeing, now you have come to the forum , wrote a lot but didn't post evidence, you didn't post your website link, you didn't post a picture of your website, you didn't post data liks that show your website traffic. so it will be very difficult to get attention that way. if you don't post any of this and wait for people to send you PM to show this dataso you're making a big mistake, it's not the people who are anxious about closing the deal, you're the distressed one who wants to close the deal early, so you need to post all data in the thread and then wait if you can attract a lot of attention or not and if you need opinions so that people are better at something people will tell you in this thread, in my opinion this is the best way to proceed, hope you will think about it.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Freedom4All on June 26, 2023, 07:31:25 PMHello online casinos and other crypto related businesses.I guess this is the best place to post this.This is a dedicated gambling announcement section so your thread or offer should be in the service sectionQuoteI manage a news and opinion website focused on a Western European country. I briefly had Google Ads on this site, but I want nothing to do with Google. I'm looking for BTC-related companies, such as casinos, crypto trading platforms, or anything that fits the website.Posting your website will give us an idea of what kind of websites you have there and check the popularity of your website maybe we can recommend your website to potential partners, and we can add suggestion on what to add to your website.QuoteIt's a website targeting a more traditional audience. By traditional, I mean people, especially those aged 30 and above, who despise globalization and value their privacy. Particularly now, as money seems to be centralized and cash is at risk of disappearing, all these people are seeking alternatives but don't know where to start. I think this audience has value for many of you.And people from all audiences gamble. Who sees an oportunity to work together with me?You have to be specific about what kind of partnership is this, are you going to advertise on these platforms that you're looking for or they are the ones to advertise on your website or you are going to link back or promote each other you have to add value to what you're offering, if its better to include the stats of your website to make it appealing to your potential partner.

comments.author: DoublerHunter
comments.body: Quote from: Freedom4All on June 26, 2023, 08:15:23 PMThat´s indeed why I opened this topic.I see a lot of crypto-casino owners or representatives.Thank you for the hint. I still have not found out which section is oppropriate or if I should PM them directly.I keep reseacrhing and I already wrote 2 casinos.More tips, VERY welcome!^ You can probably post it here.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=12.0Make sure that your project is mainly supporting BTC and you are in the right place.It seems to be careful of sending private messages that could lead to banning your account due to spamming or sending unsolicited messages. The best thing to do is become transparent, let us talk about your project publicly.

comments.author: BenCodie
comments.body: If you are wanting to offer partnership or ad space availability on your blog, then go to the Services board. The best way for you to attract potential interest is by elaborating on demographic and traffic analytics and starting off a fixed cost per click/cost per thousand views. You can check the going rate on affiliate networks. Speaking of which, if you can't find direct partnerships you can always check out crypto affiliate networks like coinzilla, who work similarly to AdWords for publishers.

comments.author: n0ne
comments.body: Directly hit on the announcement thread of the respective gambling platforms, you might get the answer at the earliest as the threads will be actively watched and responded by the executives. If they're interested you can proceed, if not once again you need to go in search. I don't think it is possible to get the right business through the gambling thread.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: Uhm it might be better to look for them since you're on the lower(if that's how you call it) side of the negotiation table? I mean if it was small casinos then it might still work, but if it was big casinos then it might be better to approach them yourself and do your sales talk directly. I reckon they'd direct you to the marketing team if they see some potential for a cooperation anyway.And Services board might also be a good place to post this. I don't think casino reps look at the posts here in the first place other than their respective threads anyway.

comments.author: noormcs5
comments.body: Quote from: Freedom4All on June 26, 2023, 08:15:23 PMThat´s indeed why I opened this topic.I see a lot of crypto-casino owners or representatives.Thank you for the hint. I still have not found out which section is oppropriate or if I should PM them directly.I keep reseacrhing and I already wrote 2 casinos.More tips, VERY welcome!Also note that casino owners will only be interested in your offer if you have a site which have a lot of audience and traffic.  Gambling casino needs marketing but they also care to how many people they can reach from certain marketing strategies.If your site is new or/and have limited traffic you may not be entertained by the gambling casino. However you can yourself start the gambling information and reviews site and you would not need any casino representatives to start with.

I did send out some emails to companies I think they fit in my website.If you need/want to contact me: live:.cid.5f5381fd5f144096Or get in contact with me via the websites email:https://commonsensetv.nl/contact/

comments.author: wiss19
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on June 26, 2023, 07:46:13 PMIf you are looking for partner with gambling casinos, it good you made your intention know here, but then , you will have to contact any particular casino you want to partner with privately through their online customer care support, this board is sure the right place to post anything gambling casino related, but then, your post is partially not supposed to be here  but in the mail box of the casino you want to partner with, as it is right now, you likely may never get a response from any casino through this thread..So better contact the gambling casinos directly and respectively. That's right, casino representatives will barely see this post and even if they see it, they will barely respond or initiate a conversation about a partnership here, so OP should definitely use the formal way of reaching out to the casino marketing team either through email or any other source, email is the recommended one though, and let them know about your proposal and ask politely if they would like to partner up with you or not.If your message is seen, which is surely going to happen, and if they like the proposal, you will surely get a response from them if they are interested in it and how the partnership can be carried out, you will get the lead and the rest is all about your communication and representation power to seal the deal.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: OP did not post the name of his website but if he wants a partnership his website should have a good ranking and it should be Crypto or gambling related, but it's better for OP to be just an affiliate of the casino that he wants to promote, earning is much better if you have a good reach and your audiences are mature audiences who will likely go for online casinos.If you want a partnership the casino will be the one to decide if they want to partner with you, if you want to be an affiliate the choice is yours and you have full control.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: This content and topic fits the Service board not here, but it seems you are interested in gambling board more than where you could get the audience for your offer.Nevertheless, I support the idea of Fivestar4everMVP in you reaching out to the casinos through their teams here and their emails. That would be very much easier and better making it faster to getting a feedback from them because you just making a post here holds no water because it would be very hard for you to be noticed here to be rendering such Services. It would be in your best interest to follow the advice as clearly stated.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: That's some pretty nice stats you have got there, just a little advice next time you're about to post image of your stats or anything make sure you convert the text to english before you capture it, that way you will carry everyone along which is very important in the kind of business you do.Quote from: Freedom4All on June 28, 2023, 07:46:22 AMWhen I am at imgur, I can not place pics directly here on the forum.I tried the BB code and the fprum code. It does not work.Should I post with another media-share platform or do I something wrong.First time it worked somehow, a few days ago.I'm not sure if anyone has brought this to your notice but newbies are not allowed to post images here, all they can do is post the link of hteir images here just as you have done. You already have 1 merit so that's stopping you from ranking up to Jr member (which will enable you psot image properly) right now is your activity and if you're not patient enough to wait for the next two activity circles to come then you can proceed to buying a copper membership[1] which gives you similar features as a member rank. [1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=credit;promote

comments.author: Freedom4All
comments.body: Thank you, Cantsay.Appreciate it.Still struggle to find the right people. I know they are here.I wrote several services and casinos where I see potential. No answers.
